aiMessages.content: You're editing a Telegram bot project.
Project created from your prompt. Ask for features and I'll modify files.
Can we add a fourth command which returns the user`s username
Added a new command to return the user's username and wired it in the bot entry file.
you forgot to initialize the bot in index.js
Initialized the bot in index.js and wired the existing commands.
no need to declare a bot instance from telegraf we already have a bot.js file that uses grammy
Updated index.js to use the bot instance from bot.js with grammy instead of telegraf.
no need to declare a bot instance from telegraf we already have a bot.js file that uses grammy
Updated index.js to use the bot instance from bot.js with grammy instead of telegraf.
